chart.title: Chart
chart.searchString: source=webanalytics* (event.meta.scheme="http" OR event.meta.scheme="https") event.meta.host=$website$ | dedup session.id | spath path=event.meta.host output=site | spath path=event.origin.meta.host output=origin2 | spath path=event.origin.meta.host output=origin3 | spath path=event.origin.meta.parameter.name output=query | rex field=event.origin.meta.query "utm_medium=(?<query>[^&]*)&" | fillnull query | stats count by site origin2 origin3 query | rex field=origin2 "(?<domain_tld>\w+\.\w{2,3}$)" | rex field=origin3 "\w*?\.?(?<domain_name>\w+)\.((\w{2}|\w{3})\.)?(\w{2}|\w{3})$" | lookup social_sites.csv social_site AS domain_tld OUTPUT acquisition | lookup search_engines.csv search_engine AS domain_name query OUTPUTNEW acquisition | lookup display_sites.csv query OUTPUTNEW acquisition | lookup email_sites.csv query OUTPUTNEW acquisition | lookup paidsearch_sites.csv query OUTPUTNEW acquisition | fillnull acquisition value=referral | eval Channel=if(site==origin2, "direct", acquisition) | stats sum(count) AS Sessions by Channel | sort - Sessions

table.title: Table
table.searchString: source=webanalytics* (event.meta.scheme="http" OR event.meta.scheme="https") event.meta.host=$website$ | dedup session.id | spath path=event.goal.step output=step | spath path=event.meta.host output=site | spath path=event.origin.meta.host output=origin2 | spath path=event.origin.meta.host output=origin3 | spath path=event.origin.meta.parameter.name output=query | rex field=event.origin.meta.query "utm_medium=(?<query>[^&]*)&" | fillnull step | fillnull query | stats count by site origin2 origin3 step query | rex field=origin2 "(?<domain_tld>\w+\.\w{2,3}$)" | rex field=origin3 "\w*?\.?(?<domain_name>\w+)\.((\w{2}|\w{3})\.)?(\w{2}|\w{3})$" | lookup social_sites.csv social_site AS domain_tld OUTPUT acquisition | lookup search_engines.csv search_engine AS domain_name query OUTPUTNEW acquisition | lookup display_sites.csv query OUTPUTNEW acquisition | lookup email_sites.csv query OUTPUTNEW acquisition | lookup paidsearch_sites.csv query OUTPUTNEW acquisition | eval conversion=if(searchmatch("step=Final*"),1,0) | fillnull acquisition value=referral | eval Channel=if(site==origin2, "direct", acquisition) | stats sum(count) AS Sessions, sum(conversion) as Conversions by Channel | sort - Sessions
